name: Coffee and Rhassoul Clay Body Mask and Scrub
description: Why waste precious cabinet space on two products when you only need one? This 2-in-1 scrub/clay contains rhassoul, a clay from Morocco with exceptional absorption power, which means it’s great at soaking up oil, blackheads, and all those other things you don’t like. The coffee grounds act as a gentle scrub and help promote radiant skin. To use, mix one tablespoon of scrub with 1 tablespoon of water. Apply to face, scrubbing in gentle circles, then let product dry completely. Rinse off with warm water and follow with toner and moisturizer. Bottle is 4 oz.

name: Holy Basil and Turmeric Body Oil
description: The holy basil plant is a staple in many indian homes. Used for thousands of years in the indian life science of Ayurveda, holy basil balances various properties in the body, and is helpful for adapting to stress. Tumeric is an essential remedy in many eastern cultures, and is actually a plant in the ginger family. Tumeric is nothing short of a wonder plant, helping with digestion, aiding with liver detoxification, and promoting circulation. It’s also a natural anti-inflammatory (great for puffy under-eye circles and overly-stressed skin!) and a natural antibacterial.  This subtle yet richly-scented product has overtones of sandalwood, leather, and douglass fir. It can be used as a face or body oil. It's super rich, and a little goes a long way. Only a few sprays are needed. For use on the face in cooler weather, we recommend sealing with a balm for added protection against the elements.  Comes in a 4 oz bottle.

name: Tea Tree and Black Pepper Toner
description: You’ve washed, you’ve scrubbed, now what? This witch hazel-based toner is a great primer for moisturizer or face oil. Simply apply to a cotton ball and swipe across the entire face. Native to Australia, the essential oil of the tea tree plant is a very powerful antibacterial and antifungal, while the spicy properties of black pepper give skin an extra boost! Comes in a 4 oz bottle.
